settings.name: VBAT_LOWV
settings.description: Battery voltage thresholds for fast charge (percent of VREG)

settings.name: REG_RST
settings.description: Reset registers to default values and reset timer

settings.name: STOP_WD_CHG
settings.description: Defines whether a watchdog timer expiration will disable charging

settings.name: EN_AUTO_IBATDIS
settings.description: Enable the auto battery discharging during the battery OVP fault

settings.name: VBUS_BACKUP
settings.description: The thresholds to trigger the backup mode, defined as a ratio of VINDPM

settings.name: HVDCP_EN
settings.description: Enable HVDCP (High Voltage Device Charging Protocol)

settings.name: DIS_ACDRV
settings.description: Disable both AC1 and AC2 drivers

settings.name: DIS_LDO
settings.description: Disable BATFET LDO mode in precharge state

settings.name: DIS_VOTG_UVP
settings.description: Disable VOTG under voltage hiccup protection

settings.name: FORCE_VINDPM_DET
settings.description: Force VINDPM detection (settable only when VBAT>VSYSMIN)

settings.name: EN_IBUS_OCP
settings.description: Enable input over current protection in forward mode

settings.name: IBAT_REG
settings.description: Battery discharge current regulation in OTG mode

settings.name: EN_EXTILIM
settings.description: Enable external ILIM_HIZ pin current regulation

settings.name: EN_BATOC
settings.description: Enable battery discharging over current protection

settings.name: BKUP_ACFET1_ON
enum_strings: Turn on ACFET1 in backup mode

settings.name: IINDPM_STAT
enum_strings: In IINDPM regulation or IOTG regulation

settings.name: VINDPM_STAT
enum_strings: In VINDPM regulation or VOTG regulation

settings.name: VBUS_STAT
enum_strings: No Input or BHOT or BCOLD in OTG mode

settings.name: DPDM_STAT
enum_strings: D+/D- detection NOT started yet or done

settings.name: VBATOTG_LOW_STAT
settings.description: VBAT too low to enable OTG flag
enum_strings: VBAT is too low to enable OTG mode
VBAT is high enough to enable OTG operation

settings.name: TS_COLD_STAT
settings.description: The TS temperature is in the cold range

settings.name: TS_COOL_STAT
settings.description: The TS temperature is in the cool range

settings.name: TS_WARM_STAT
settings.description: The TS temperature is in the warm range

settings.name: TS_HOT_STAT
settings.description: The TS temperature is in the hot range
